question: Analyze the social media engagement of companies in the technology industry.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the technology industry along with their IDs and relevant details.
Gather social media engagement metrics for identified companies from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube.
Compile and aggregate engagement metrics (likes, comments, reposts) across different platforms to analyze overall social media performance.
Compare the social media engagement of technology companies to industry benchmarks or trends using the IndustryITTrend table.
